resources.string: Each time you click \'Execute some random task\' it will simply queue a new task that takes from 0 to 10 secs to execute. While task is running the button is disabled. This is just to demonstrate a result receiver. This also demonstrate that result receivers callbacks run in the UI thread.
Same as SimpleExample, but also demonstrates how to handle config changes like device rotation. Go ahead, don\'t be afraid, rotate the phone just after you have queue the task.
